_header: Saint Firmin the bishop was of holy life
Subjects: saints’ lives; Firmin, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Firmin in one MS of the South English Legendary — couplets

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint firmin þe bisschop was of holy lyfswyþe moche he
                    hated velenye & stryf…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…nouȝ bidde we alle Ihesu crist for loue of seint
                    firminÞat he vs chelde fram senne & saue vs fram helle
                    pin
Bod779.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Des Ms. Bodl. 779 jüngere Zusatzlegenden zur südlichen
                Legendensammlung.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         82 (1889): 307-422: 348-51.
